column4: You may be able to purge a repo where Firefox was, and uninstall Firefox X.XX and install firefox 3.XX
What Ubuntu are you running? What FF are you running? What repo did you get your FF from?
I am running Ubuntu 11.04 and FF was auto-upgraded to 5 via the default repos
i AM SO SORRY - YOU MAY BE STUCK WITH THE LATEST ff IF IT IS FROM THE OFFICIAL REPO :(
